attributes.action: Fully fund repair and re-instatement of the Royal Marsden Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Royal Marsden Hospital provides an excellent service in the treatment of cancer and research into the treatment and cure for cancer.

We have all heard of the devastating fire that has destroyed so much of the Hospital and curtailed the excellent work of the Hospital and its magnificent and dedicated staff.

Recovery from such a devastating event  is never fully achieved without major financial support - to enable full restitution of the Royal Marsden with re-instatement of all its services and facilities, Governmental support and funding will be required.

Please join this petition as your contribution to persuade the Government to fully support the financial need of the Royal Marsden Hospital.  Thank you.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Fully fund repair and re-instatement of the Royal Marsden Hospital."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18410


Prime Minister's Office
